about_the_game:
This is an idle game!

You can randomly drop gold bags and gold when you idle!

The value of gold depends on its weight!

The heavier the weight, the rarer it is!

Come and earn your first pot of gold in life!
detailed_description:
This is an idle game!

You can randomly drop gold bags and gold when you idle!

The value of gold depends on its weight!

The heavier the weight, the rarer it is!

Come and earn your first pot of gold in life!
developers: 井盖工作室 Manhole Cover Studio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10+
  • Processor: APPLE M1 Or Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10+
  • Processor: APPLE M1 Or Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Gold

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Memory: 1.0 GHz GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Memory: 1.0 GHz or higher GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

publishers: 井盖工作室 Manhole Cover Studio
short_description: This is an idle game! You can randomly drop gold bags and gold when you idle! The value of gold depends on its weight! The heavier the weight, the rarer it is! Come and earn your first pot of gold in life!
